title: creativeLIVE - After Effects CC Fundamentals (WEB-Rip)
description:
"Adobe After Effects CC is a hallmark broadcast video and film production program - but it has so many functions, it's hard to know where to start. In this 3-day workshop, renowned video producer and Adobe Certified Expert Jeff Foster will walk you through how to use After Effects' many functions to enhance your projects with visual effects and motion graphics.

You'll learn the basics for controlling movement, animating simple objects and 3D space, create interesting text and title animations, composite videos with and without green screen. Using real-world production examples, Jeff will guide you through this complex program and unpack the tools and terminology so that you can apply your skills right away and with confidence.

BIO:

Jeff Foster is a published author of several computer technology, animation and video production VFX books. He has been an Adobe Certified Expert and has served as an instructor and featured speaker at conferences such as Photoshop World, Macworld, Adobe MAX and the NAB (National Association of Broadcasters) Post-Production Conferences.

Foster has been producing and providing training for traditional and digital images, photography, illustration, motion graphics and special effects for DV and Film for over 20 years. Some of his clients include: Tribune Broadcasting, Motorola, McDonnell Douglas, NestlÃƒÂ©, FOX Television, Spike TV, Discovery/TLC, Deluxe Digital, Universal Studios, Lions Gate Films and Disney. He is also a 2010 Telly Awards recipient for his "Documercial" video productions.

He's been published internationally through Pearson, Sybex & Wiley and several trade magazine and hosted online ezines and regularly contributes in the ProVideo Coalition. He is the author of "The Green Screen Handbook" (Sybex/Wiley, pub) to serve as a texbook for green screen production and compositing techniques. Pro photographers, Indie filmmakers and hobbyists will find this book a valuable tool for getting the best results from their compositing projects.

In addition to the many post-production projects he does for the feature film industry, he also operates a media production company, Sound Visions Media provides quality HD video production from an experienced team of industry professionals. Sound Visions Media specializes in producing promotional videos for businesses, artists, musicians and entrepreneurs who have a compelling story to tell - from commercials to feature-length documentaries. They've branded the concept of their award-winning "Documercial" as a method of storytelling in a documentary style approach to deliver a marketing message for their clients.

With several exciting new projects forthcoming, Jeff is currently working from his studio in Concord, CA.

Session 1 August 12, 2013

Day 1 - Pre-Show
9:00 am - What's New in AE CC?
9:15 am - Navigating the Interface & Managing the Workspace
9:30 am - Importing Assets & Layer Styles
10:00 am - Blending
10:45 am - Creating Sub-Compositions
11:00 am - Working with Layers & Blending Modes
11:15 am - Parenting Layers
12:45 pm - Working with Text Layers
1:00 pm - Animating Text & Presets
1:45 pm - Animating Text on a Path
2:30 pm - Creating & Animating Vector Masks
3:00 pm - Q & A
Day 1 - Wrap-Up

Session 2 August 13, 2013

Day 2 - Pre-Show
9:00 am - Applying Effects to Layers
10:00 am - Liquify Filter & Puppet Tool
10:45 am - Converting Illustrator Files to Shapes
11:15 am - Animating Vector Shapes (2D)
12:45 pm - Exploring & Understanding 3D Space
1:15 pm - Extruding Text & Vector Shapes
1:30 pm - Bending Comps & Footage Layers
2:30 pm - Cinema 4D Lite with AE CC
Day 2 - Wrap-Up

Session 3 August 14, 2013

Day 3 - Pre-Show
9:00 am - Stabalizing Shaky Video Footage
9:30 am - Motion Tracking Basics
10:00 am - 3D Tracker
10:45 am - Green Screen Compositing with Keylight
12:45 pm - Rotobrush & Rotoscope Techniques
1:15 pm - Rotoscoping Techniques Continued
1:45 pm - Rotoscoping with Green Screen
2:30 pm - Dynamic Linking with Premiere CC
2:45 pm - Using Expressions for Cartoon Lip Sync
3:15 pm - Live Action News Template Breakdown
3:30 pm - Q & A
Day 3 - Wrap-Up"
